info.name: Organization API (Lambda)
info.description:
REST API for managing organization data via AWS Lambda Runtime Interface Emulator.

**IMPORTANT**: This API runs as a Lambda container. All requests must be POST to the Lambda RIE endpoint with an API Gateway V2 event payload.

## Local Development
- URL: http://localhost:9005/2015-03-31/functions/function/invocations
- All requests are POST with JSON body containing the API Gateway event

## Authentication
Most endpoints require a JWT token. Generate one with:
```bash
npm run jwt:generate --workspace=@grounded/organization-api
```

variable.description: JWT token for authentication. Generate with: npm run jwt:generate --workspace=@grounded/organization-api
